name: Floppy Pipe - Birds Revenge
description:
Time for revenge in 8-bit world!

Meet the Floppy Pipe - flying flappy pipe in the world of birds. Fly your flappy pipe & dodge birdie obstacles. Gain the best score and compete with your friends.

> Tap to flap and fly you floppy pipe
> Dodge the birds
> Enjoy the beauty of 8-bit world
> Don't let birds have their flappy revenge!

Tap to control your flying floppy pipe, dodge all the birds columns by going through the empty gaps and get the best score. Invite your friends and start playing now ! Check each other best scores in the global ranking.

Don't let angry flap birds have their revenge !

DOWNLOAD from Google Play:

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.flappy.angry.pipe.birds.revenge.free
